meanings.sent1: The scuzzier old rug was perfect for the messy garage floor.
meanings.sent2: After playing outside, the kids came back scuzzier than when they left.
meanings.sent3: The scuzzier the dog got, the happier he seemed to be.
meanings.sent4: Her scuzzier appearance matched her rebellious attitude.
meanings.sent5: The scuzzier the windows, the dimmer the room felt.

meanings.definition: Of lower quality or less desirable than something else
meanings.sent1: The scuzzier brand of soap didn't lather as well as the expensive one.
meanings.sent2: The scuzzier car had more dents and scratches than the newer model.
meanings.sent3: She preferred the scuzzier version of the song because it felt more authentic.
meanings.sent4: His scuzzier behavior made him stand out in a negative way.
meanings.sent5: The scuzzier the paint job, the less appealing the house looked.
